DOC.brief_summary: This study has the purpose to investigate the benefit of treating breast cancer patients in prone position. This treatment is compared to the standard technique in our center (supine position with or without respiratory gating). The investigators want to compare the doses on the organs at risk (heart and lungs) in the different techniques.
DOC.brief_title: Potential Benefits of Radiotherapy in Prone Position for Breast Cancer Patients: a Planning Study
DOC.criteria: indication for radiotherapy of the breast and /or lymph nodes none ( planning study)
